article_title: KentuckyOne's CEO cites health care reform as reason for layoffs
article_text: The recession has come to health care and the problems that it presents are not unique to KentuckyOneHealth, its CEO said Wednesday. Ruth Brinkley, president and CEO of KentuckyOne Health, said the layoffs and loss of beds her organization is facing are challenges, but patients should be able to get the medical care that they need.
